title: Il Giardino
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Italian, Beer/Wine, Latin American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This hotel-restaurant has a setting of a hidden garden off of the main footpath. At night it it's lit with candles and each seat is nestled in amongst large tropical plants. Food ranges from pizza and pasta to salads, soups, Latin American fare and desserts. The owner/chef speaks many languages. Has Wi-Fi. Previously pure vegetarian menu but added meat in 2014.
streetAddress: San Marcos La Laguna, Lake Atitlan
